dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3643670A] FW: Serious violations
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: alessandro@onclassical.com [mailto:alessandro@onclassical.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 27, 2007 3:16 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3643670A] FW: Serious violations

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

Subject: Serious violations 
 
 
| To Whom it may concern, 
| 
| We sent the following email to the webmaster of hamienet.com, 
| 
| please provide to contact the webmaster of hamienet.com and to  
inform 
| him about his serious copyright violation! Thank you! 
| 
| -- 
| 
| To the webmasters of hamienet.com, 
| 
| You hosted our private files and contributors' work without any 
| license. Remove our material from your site as soon as possibile.  
You 
| have not obtained any permission to publish our files on your site.  
If 
| we don't see any modification until 1-2 days we will surely proceed 
| against you by legal ways. 
| 
| The owner of kunstderfuge.com, 
| 
| Alessandro Simonetto
